entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
